km 9 na estrada Valença-Guaibim.
occurrenceRemarks: Slender treelet 5 m. tall growing in disturbed restinga on white sand. Trunk dark brown, 2 cm in diameter. Branches few, horizontal, plagiotropic; branches and twigs dark reddish brown with pale brown lenticels. Leaves plane, dark shiny green on upper surface; somewhat lighter green, shiny on lower surface. Flowers solitary to 3, in axils on last and current season´s growth, creamy white. fruits light red-orange. Long-styled plant.

recordedBy: T. Plowman; André M. de Carvalho
locality: Km. 9 na estrada Valença - Guibim. .
occurrenceRemarks: Immature shrub 1,3 m tall in disturbed restinga. Branchlets reddish brown. Leaves dark green, shiny on upper surface, with lighter green, midrib; leaves lighter green on lower surface, shiny. Sterile.
